name: To Reach Again
description:
Notice!                                                                                                                                                                  An accidental "typo" in the first level has it say that the drag rope button is q. The actual button is left Shift for the player on the right of the screen.

To Reach Again is a 2D 2-player puzzle game. Move solve puzzles my moving blocks with your grappling hook or pushing them so that you and player 2 can reach each other once again.

To Reach Again is the first released game from The Game Shelf, in collaboration with the members of the project listed below. This game was made for the forth Extra Credits Game Jam.

Click on the members names to check out their portfolio's or to get in contact.

Members of The Game Shelf:

Matthew Zolfo - Programming/Design/Sound Design (Forgot to put himself in game credits)

Nicholas Favia - Programming/Design/Art

Collaborators:

Joshua Duffy  - Art/Title Card

Alex Riak - Composer/Sound Design

Daniel Zolfo - Game Title

If you want to see the source code check out our github page for it: 

https://github.com/mzolfo/ECGameJamGameShelf
